name: Studyum
description: Studyum is the next-generation learning experience platform, combining artificial intelligence, facial recognition, 3D volumetric avatars, with NFTfi trading, all on the blockchain. Studyum simultaneously rewards students and educators, ensuring the long-term retention of our users actively encouraging the adoption of our cryptocurrency, with the Studyum smart contract token (STUD). Studyum uses the tokens to incentivize educators, students, and institutions.
